data.app_name: Silent Slayer: Vault of the Vampire
data.description:
Become a vampire slayer on a mythic quest to eliminate these powerful sleeping monsters  — an endeavor undertaken by only the bravest souls. 

In this jumpscare game with elements of horror and puzzle, you must destroy a clan of ancient vampires by carefully disarming their coffins’ defenses with the help of your guide — a mystical book. A pry bar, clippers, and a hook made from a finger bone are among the many tools within reach, but a stake through the heart is the only way to end it. 

Tension builds as you cautiously lift bars, remove nails, and clip wires to find the vampire’s heart. Your silence and precision are key as you avoid awakening the beasts who will drain your life instantly. 

In this game, be prepared for...

**Vicious Vampires** – Make one wrong move and you will have a royal court of deadly vampires on the attack
{3111251929010191}

**Diabolical Defenses** – Untangle increasingly imposing and intricate traps ready to be tripped by an unsteady hand

{1161452688240580}

**Tactical Tools** – Master several unique instruments as you encounter increasingly difficult situations
{972382391246514}

**Devilish  Distractions** – Maintain unwavering focus to conquer the unsettling diversions that will surely challenge even the strongest slayers
{360415666648571}


**Twisting Tale** – Your story unfolds one coffin at a time. Heed the book’s advice, raise your stake, and do not miss


Annihilate them, Slayer!

Patch 1.1.2 Bug Fixes and Updates —
- Coffin and tool table will properly adjust to player height on level load.

Patch 1.1.1 Bug Fixes and Updates —
- Addressed performance / hitching issues.

Patch 1.1.0 Bug Fixes and Updates —
- Addressed a game crash related to recalibration. Calibrating player position is more consistent.
- Addressed a game crash related to dropping tools in the coffin. Under-the-hood coffin set-up has been tweaked.
- Save toasts are now headtracked. All toasts and subtitles react to pausing appropriately.
- Players can no longer go under or get objects stuck under the floor.
- Some distractions would collide with the coffin door. They have been adjusted to navigate around the door.
- Watchful Idol tweaks so players have more forgiveness during interactions.
- Tools will settle on the table properly instead of respawning.  
- Tools no longer explode off the table when released.
- Gem sockets are adjusted to reduce physics issues when gems are hooked.
- Items no longer appear during teleportation to/from an encounter.
- Progress related sound effects now adjusted through audio settings.
- New dialogue for Book-Binder in Encounter 10.
